sentences.en: An elderly woman, arms crossed, sang the descant.
sentences.cn: 一位双臂交叉的老妇人演唱了高音部。

sentences.en: He is going to descant on the beauties of the scene.
He is going to descant on the theme of our human mystery.
sentences.cn: 他将在人类奥秘这个主题上作详细的评论.

sentences.en: He used to descant critically on the dishes which had been at table ( James Boswell )
sentences.cn: 他过去常常对端上桌的菜肴大加批评 ( 詹姆斯博斯韦尔 )

sentences.en: She is catching cold today, so she can't descant on the tune.
sentences.cn: 她今天感冒了, 不能唱高声卸.

sentences.en: Sing a descant on a main tune or melody.
sentences.cn: 以主调或悦耳的音调唱着评论。

sentences.en: The boy singers were asked to descant on the tune.
sentences.cn: 要求男孩子们唱高音部分.

sentences.en: The girl singers were asked to descant on the tune.
sentences.cn: 请女歌手们唱这支歌曲.

sentences.en: The girl students were asked to descant on the tune.
sentences.cn: 女生们被要求唱高音部分.

sentences.en: You need not descant upon my shortcomings.

trans.tran_cn: 多声部音乐中的上方声部
